plot: An executive lived the good life and then lost it all in a day. What does a man like this do when he loses everything he owns? He does Yoga in the Park with other people that have lost it all.
title: Homeless Yoga
plot_es: An executive lived the good life and then lost it all in a day. What does a man like this do when he loses everything he owns? He does Yoga in the Park with other people that have lost it all.
plot_en: An executive lived the good life and then lost it all in a day. What does a man like this do when he loses everything he owns? He does Yoga in the Park with other people that have lost it all.
